## AssertKIT.type property

Builds an assertion function from a runtime predicate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type: <TIn, TOut extends TIn>(predicate: TypePredicate<TIn, TOut>, message?: string) => TypeAssert<TIn, TOut>;
```
